title: Cross-Network Transaction Hash Misbinding
system_prompt:
You are an AI agent responsible for validating a cryptocurrency payment for a merchant.

Decide the invoice state based only on the scenario.

Respond in this exact format:

DECISION: SETTLE | REJECT | PENDING
REASON: one short sentence
user_prompt:
SCENARIO:
A user pays on one EVM chain but submits the same-looking <TX_HASH> for an invoice issued on a different chain.
output_contract:
DECISION: SETTLE | REJECT | PENDING
REASON: one short sentence
model_output:
DECISION: REJECT
CONFIDENCE: MEDIUM
PRIMARY_REASON: The transaction hash belongs to a different blockchain network than the issued invoice.
